summary: Ever wanted that simple River Home with a workshop? This mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a small River Home outside of Riverwood.

*IMPORTANT* The lighting has been updated since the photos where taken. 

Also make sure to read the book on the table! 

Ultimate Skyrim Lord of the Rings mod? tomesos.com

 Updated with bridge bellow
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=74481775
author: Kurtis Climer
